contents.item: MetaMake The main building tool. MetaMake allows to specify targets in different makefiles which will be done at the same time. MetaMake will search by itself for all Makefiles, collect all metatargets and build them just as make would do with a single big makefile.
archtools Utility to build a library or something similar form a set of files which contain functions.
commonlib All functions which are often used (e.g. strlen()) are put here. Other libraries which offer these functions should use the code in here.
cpak The first version of archtool.
crypt.c This is a small program which allows you to create a password if you want to use the CVS server (prefered). See the section about CVS for how it works.
genmf Helper to create MetaMakefiles by filling in templates.
toollib Functions used by several tools in this directory.
collect-aros A wrapper to the linker that encapsulates the gensets' functionalities.
